process.name: QA - Templates - Segregated Permissions
process.narrative: Each action in this object contains a group of actions from the blue prism object, useful for reuse in parituclar for writing automation tests for segregated permissions.

stage.name: Create Role/User
stage.narrative: Template creates a role and then user thats is assigned the specified role

stage.name: Note1
stage.narrative:
Clean Up Page
This is an optional page where you might choose to perform some finalisation (or "cleanup") tasks as your business object is closed down.
The cleanup action will be called automatically immediately after closing your business object at the end of a business process.
You will not be able to call this action from a business process, nor will it be called at any other time than before the disposal of the business object.

stage.name: Note2
stage.narrative:
Initialise Page
This is an optional page where you might choose to perform some initialisation tasks after your business object is loaded.
The initialise action will be called automatically immediately after loading your business object.
You will not be able to call this action from a business process, nor will it be called at any other time than after the creation of the object.

condition.narrative: Must be logged into Blue Prism

input.name: Role Permissions
input.narrative: Collection containing nodes and values for child nodes (check/unchecl)

field.name: Parent Node
field.description: Name of the parent node you wish to set a permission on

field.name: Child Node
field.description: Name of the node you wish to set a permission on

input.name: Parent Node Name
input.narrative: Name of the Parent Node which child belongs to.

input.name: Child Node Name
input.narrative: Name of the child node to Check or Uncheck.

input.name: Check?
input.narrative: True if Item needs to be Checked, False if Item needs to be unchecked.

input.name: Tree Name
input.narrative: Name of the tree to be extended.

input.name: Item Name
input.narrative: Name of the item to be clicked on.

input.name: New Role Name
input.narrative: Name of the new Role

input.name: Tree Name
input.narrative: Name of the tree to be extended.

input.name: Item Name
input.narrative: Name of the item to be clicked on.

input.name: Username
input.narrative: The username of the user you wish to create.

input.name: Password
input.narrative: The password in which you want to assign to the user.

input.name: User Expiry Date
input.narrative: The date in which the user account will expire.

input.name: Password Expiry Date
input.narrative: The date in which the password will expire.

input.name: Roles
input.narrative: The roles you wish to give to your user.

input.name: Password Duration
input.narrative: The duration, in weeks you wish the password to last before expiring.

input.name: Tab Name
input.narrative: Name of Tab to Click

stage.name: Get Permissions
stage.narrative: Collection of actions to retrieve the permissions set for a specified Role [User Role] on a given group [Target Group]

condition.narrative: Must be logged into Blue Prism and attached to the instance.

input.name: Target Element
input.narrative: Element (Process/object/group) to display current Access rights

input.name: Nested?
input.narrative: Set flag if element is contained within another element

input.name: Nesting Structure
input.narrative: Provide a colleciton of parent elements to expand nodes

output.name: Access Rights Screen loaded
output.narrative: Flag set to true if screen successfully loaded

output.name: Exception
output.narrative: Exception text output

resource.action: Manage Access Rights Get Individual Permissions - Process

stage.name: Set Permissions
stage.narrative: Changes the Given Group to Unrestricted Passes in a collection containing Role and Permissions Checked/unchecl (True/False) Accomdates setting permissions on multiple roles for a given folder by adding rows in the collection

input.name: Tab Name
input.narrative: Name of Tab to Click

output.name: Exception
output.narrative: Exception from action call if Applicable

output.name: Success?
output.narrative: Flag determining if action was successful

input.name: Target Element
input.narrative: Element (Process/object/group) to display current Access rights

input.name: Nested?
input.narrative: Set flag if element is contained within another element

input.name: Nesting Structure
input.narrative: Provide a colleciton of parent elements to expand nodes

output.name: Access Rights Screen loaded
output.narrative: Flag set to true if screen successfully loaded

output.name: Exception
output.narrative: Exception text output

input.name: Set Role Permissions
input.narrative: Collection with users and permissions to be set

input.name: Negative Test?
input.narrative: flag to change the flow so a user can attempt to set permissions when folder is not restritcted

output.name: Permissions Set?
output.narrative: Flag to indicate if permissions have been set

output.name: Exception
output.narrative: text passed from exception

input.name: Select Item Method?
input.narrative: True by Default. Selects the node from system tab using Select Item approach. If the node is not available (Greyed out) an exception will be thrown. Use this method if you are certain the node is available for selection.

input.name: Retry MouseClick?
input.narrative: Default to True. Retries Global Mouse Click up to 3 times.

input.name: Clean Up?
input.narrative: False by Default. Set True if clean up is required at the beginning of the Action.
